concept.title: Spatial views
concept.shortdesc: Spatial views provide multidimensional spatial indexes in Couchbase.

conbody.p: A spatial index contains geometry data that can be queried to return information based on whether the recorded geometries exist within a given multidimensional range.
An index is created by emitting values and keys. The value is JSON. The key is either a GeoJSON geometry or an array of numeric ranges.
